signin.title: Sign in required
signin.description: To participate in this course, you have to be signed in. No worries, it's all free. This is so we can show you your progress within the course.

students.gradeEstimate: Based on your practice so far, we expect a score of roughly {percentage} (about {lowerPercentage} - {upperPercentage}) on the final test.
students.disclaimer: No rights can be derived from this estimate.
students.practiceRecommendation: This is currently the recommended skill to practice.
students.sufficientMastery: You have sufficiently mastered this skill.
students.followUpMastery: You have mastered a follow-up skill, so we mark this one as sufficient as well.
students.noExercises: This skill has no exercises yet. They are probably coming soon.
students.noSkills: This block is still under development: no skills/exercises have been added yet. They will be here shortly!

teachers.noStudents: Your course is ready, but there are no students yet. Share the course link (this page's URL) with students, or ask them to add the course from the full list.For further options, check out the Course Settings (top right).
